page.title: 06PORTWAY INFANT SCHOOL CONT
page.content: l980 Mr. Secuna took over until February l983 when Mr.Petty took over. He resigned in April l984 and Mr.Blackmoore took over. He is now the present caretaker. The school opened with Mrs. Werner as the secretary until l966 when Mrs.Brown took over. In September l967 Mrs. Downing joined. In April l969 Mrs.Reeder succeeded her but she left in May l980 and was replaced by Mrs. Waine who was acting secretary until September l980 when Mrs. Level and Mrs. Winkworth took over, doing shifts in the morning and Mrs. Winkworth at post meridian (pm). The Pre-School Library opened in January l984. For the first term it only served children who were beginning in the next term. But in April l984 it was decided that the period should be extended by one term.
